products.name: Ball
products.description: Rounded item. Used to play many games; team and single games.

products.name: BBQ Grill
products.description: Used to cook food using charcoal or heated iron.

products.name: Dishes
products.description: Dishes are used to place your food on, and eat from it.

products.name: Oil
products.description: Multipurpose item. You can burn a person, a house or even complete forests if used with fire. It is also commonly used for cooking.

products.name: Spoon
products.description: You can use this item to eat many food items.
